name: Me Girl Celebs - Dress your way to movie stardom!
name_original: Me Girl Celebs - Dress your way to movie stardom!
description:
Dream big and shoot for the stars! The movie stars, that is.

In Me Girl Celebs, dine with famous celebs as you become the hottest director in town!

WELCOME TO SHOWBIZ, BABY!
* Direct your own movies to become a famous director!
* Decide how you want your movie to look!
* Hire famous celebs to star in your movies!
* Dress up your actors in trendy fashions fit for the part!
* Film on location, with many 3D sets to choose from!
* Choose how you want your movie to end!

MEET FAMOUS CELEBS
*Meet the most famous celebrities in Glamourwood, like Chat Pitt and Donny Dipp!
*Help unknown actors become famous by casting them in your movies and being seen with them at casinos!

GET RICH!
*Earn money and fame whenever you premiere a new movie!
*Do fun jobs, like making commercials, going to wacky conventions, and walking the red carpet!

Play Me Girl Celebs and join the ranks of the rich and famous!

Lights! Camera! Action!
__________________________________
Notes:
- You can play offline, data is required for In-App Purchasing
- The game will download new content automatically
